If you've always thought Polish was impossible to learn, it's time to change your mind.




My skillfully tailored language courses will help you untangle the infamous Polish grammar, improve your pronunciation, spelling and communication skills and teach you how to learn languages effectively.
And it will be a lot of fun!



I want to start learning!

My services - now also online!


Individual classes

For 1-2 students, tailored to your needs and expectations. A great way to get you started and master the basics.

Group classes

For 3-6 students, full of games and language puzzles. Become a language detective and learn by doing.

For mixed-language couples. Your guide to learning Polish together at home without frustration.

Experiential learning and gamification

I apply games to transform complex educational content into engaging, immersive learning experiences - no more boring grammar coursebooks and starting to talk 'when you're ready'. Games give you an amazing opportunity to role play in new contexts and implement new skills on-the-job, make mistakes in a safe environment, practice, have fun and learn some more.

So stop wasting your time on learning from books for children or language apps and learn through language puzzles, improvisation and experimenting with alternative communication channels - Iâ€™m sure youâ€™ve never tried a language course like this! You are going to love it and you are going to see fast results. And in the moments of doubt I will support you with a learning mentoring session helping you evaluate your learning process and suggesting valuable improvements.

Effective

Getting involved in the learning process through multiple communication chanells

Immersive

Learning by immersion in new experiences for a real perspective change

Practical

Learning on-the-job and immediately using new skills in action

Fun

No more overanalysing and dry theory, the world of knowledge is exciting!

Waaaaaaait...Did you know I also do

Translations and proofreading

I will help you strike the right chord with your Polish readers by translating and reviewing your texts in the field of IT, marketing, business, finance and humanities. Your text will be professionally transtalted into Polish and proofread by a native speaker to help you effectively communicate with the target audience of your choice.

Every translation project is an exciting journey into the world of linguistics and specialised vocabulary, I am looking forward to working on your text!
